message: This is the first product I'm offering you. It's a one-time offer at $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, but I want to give you a chance to inspect it carefully before making a decision. Take your time, but please respond with 'yes' if you're willing to take the risk.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm willing to take the risk on the first product. Let's see what we've got!

You took the risk and bought the first product, but unfortunately, it's not the best quality. I want to be transparent with you, the product you just bought is indeed low-quality. Given this, I'm offering you a second chance with a new product at the same price of $10000. I'm not sure if you'll be willing to take another risk, but I want to give you the opportunity to make a decision based on the information you now have.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty, but after seeing the first product, I'm not confident in your ability to offer me high-quality products. I'm going to pass on this one.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to communicate with me. I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with the best possible experience. However, I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is also low-quality. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000. If you're willing to take another chance, I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect the product more closely. I'll send you a detailed description of its features and specifications, and you can decide based on that.

Alice, I appreciate your transparency and the offer to inspect the product, but two low-quality products in a row make me doubt your ability to offer a high-quality product. I'm going to pass on this one.

Bob, I understand your concerns, and I don't blame you for being cautious. However, I'm glad you gave me the opportunity to redeem myself. If you're not satisfied, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund. If you do decide to keep it, you'll only pay the full price of $10000 after the 30-day period. What do you say?
